entry.tran: (社会或国家中)某群体的，某阶层的
entry.def: Sectional interests are those of a particular group within a community or country.

example.tran: 他批评了某些利益团体自私自利的态度。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or based upon a section (i.e. as if cut through by an intersecting plane);
2. consisting of or divided into sections;

stems_affixes.word_buile: sect切,割+arian……的,有人的意思→把人群分开的→搞宗派的
section[[n.章节,部分;地区,部门,科;截面,剖面]]糠?al……的→adj.可组合的
dissect[v.解剖;详细研究]+ion表名词→n.解剖,切开
in进入+sect切,割→昆虫一节一节如被切开
